summary: This is an email chain from August 12, 2008, discussing a scheduled conference call with attorney Roy Black. The sender, an Assistant U.S. Attorney, mentions a 2.5-hour meeting with the DEA that motivated them to work on the Epstein case.

persons.name: Roy Black
persons.context: Scheduled to participate in a conference call with the Assistant U.S. Attorney and another individual (likely a colleague).

events.title: DEA Meeting
events.description: A 2.5-hour meeting between the Assistant U.S. Attorney and the DEA that motivated the attorney to work on the Epstein case.

events.title: Scheduled Conference Call with Roy Black
events.description: A conference call scheduled for 4:15 PM involving Roy Black, the Assistant U.S. Attorney, and another individual.

locations: 500 S. Australian Ave, Suite 400, West Palm Beach, FL 33401
keyFacts: An Assistant U.S. Attorney had a 2.5-hour meeting with the DEA on August 12, 2008.
The DEA meeting made the attorney want to work on the Epstein case.
A conference call with attorney Roy Black was scheduled for 4:15 PM on August 12, 2008.
The correspondence originates from the U.S. Attorney's Office in West Palm Beach, Florida.
